title: BREAKING! Luna-25 Has Crashed, Confirmed By Russia
summary: Russia's lunar exploration mission Luna-25, has ended in failure after the spacecraft crashed into the moon's surface; the announcement was made by Russia's space agency, Roscosmos, through a statement on their Telegram on the morning of August 20.

title: Luna-25 Crashes Into Moon
summary: Russia joined the growing list of lunar lander failures today. Luna-25 crashed into the Moon following an anomaly yesterday after a command was sent to change the spacecraft’s orbit. Communications […]

title: Russia’s Luna 25 spacecraft has crashed into the Moon
summary: This is a stunning loss for the Russian space program.

title: Luna-25 crashes into moon after orbit maneuver
summary: Russia’s Luna-25 mission ended in failure after crashing into the moon, space agency Roscosmos has announced.

title: Russia’s Luna-25 Lunar Lander Experiences Anomaly
summary: Russia’s space agency Roscosmos is reporting today that Luna-25 experienced an anomaly after being commanded to adjust its orbit around the Moon in preparation for landing on Monday. Luna-25 is […]

title: Using data from InSight, scientists discover that Mars is rotating faster
summary: In December 2022, NASA lost contact with its Interior Exploration using Seismic Investigations, Geodesy and Heat Transport (InSight) Mars lander, which had been operating on the Martian surface for just over four years. In the time since InSight’s mission was declared over, scientists have continued to analyze the incredible data the lander collected and have made some exciting discoveries.

title: Luna-25 Suffers "Emergency Situation" In Lunar Orbit
summary: Russia's Luna-25 spacecraft has encountered an "emergency situation" during a critical maneuver in Lunar orbit.

title: Luna-25 malfunctions during lunar orbit maneuver
summary: Russia’s first lunar mission in nearly half a century suffered an “emergency situation” during an attempted maneuver Aug. 19, putting plans for a landing into question.

title: New “Lexicon for Outer Space Security” Ready for Final OEWG Session
